name: Hook & Swing
description:
Hook & Swing

A physics-based game where you swing from point to point using your grappling hook.

I've created this game within 48 hours during a game jam using Unreal engine.

The theme of the game jam is 'Connections'.

Press Left Mouse Button to Fire Grapple Hook. Hold Left Mouse Button to Hold the Hook.

W, A, S, D for Swing/Move.
